((Note I'm not sure if the Lunge is a mode the rules were not to clear))
Tigerhawk come on at Jets maximum burn adding furry to the gestalt throw. 
Tigerhawk fires the pure water grenade at the shields as it hits creating a 
weak point in the shield and Force of the throw push him on threw. 

As the autoguns cut on nailing him as he Flies towards the alliance base. 
Tigerhawk start to focus creating an energy beam and fires it weakening his 
point of entry and the force of the throw combined with his jets pushes him 
through the outside wall and the next one and the next one as he starts to 
panic about stopping Tigerhawk flailing his arms grabbing a medium sided 
metal shielding plate as it rips off he flies right through the next wall 
into the prison cell. Flies straight into Scattershot hitting him hard enough 
to push him through the cell bars to be precise. Finally stopping Tigerhawk 
lunges and pushes Punch in front letting him take the autogun fire. Aims and 
places several careful shots at the autoguns. "Don't worry gents I can show 
myself the way out." Tigerhawk Picks up the two injured ladies. Flies out  
the way he came barely making it through the shield.  Hiding in somewhere in 
the forest. "just may luck to save two beauty full women and there both out 
cold." Heads toward the Ark.
